/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. 

On either side of the street, lush green trees line the road, their leaves rustling in the unseen breeze. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades a testament to the architectural diversity of the city. 

Cars of different makes and models are scattered across the street, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. They are in motion, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. 

Streetlights stand sentinel along the road, their lights off in the daylight but ready to illuminate the scene as dusk falls. Power lines crisscross above, forming a complex web against the sky. 

The image is taken from a low angle, making the viewer feel as if they are part of the scene, looking up at the towering buildings and the expansive sky. It's a snapshot of urban life, a moment frozen in time on a busy street in Beijing.
